title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        New Regulations Prohibit Brown and Black Bear Baiting  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, New Regulations Prohibit Brown and Black Bear Baiting  Baiting for black and brown bears is prohibited in Wrangell-St. Elias National Preserve. Regulations also prohibit taking wolves and coyotes (including pups) from May 1 through August 9 and prohibit using dogs to hunt big game, including black bears. more          Authorized Park Concessionaires Has Changed  Alert 2 , Severity ,information ,, Authorized Park Concessionaires Has Changed  The list of authorized concessionaires for Wrangell-St. Elias has recently changed. PLEASE check the park's list of all concessions authorized to provide sport hunting services in the park BEFORE hiring a service. Click "more" for this list: more          Copper Center Visitor Center Now Open for 2016  Alert 3 , Severity ,information ,, Copper Center Visitor Center Now Open for 2016  The Copper Center Visitor Center, at mile 106.8 Richardson Highway, has opened for the 2016 season. The current Summer hours of operation are Daily, 9:00 am to 6:00 pm, as staffing permits.
